evidence.claim: RemitDATA utilizes AWS for cloud services.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations for health data.
RemitDATA's solutions integrate with X12 transaction sets for electronic claims processing.
RemitDATA supports FHIR protocols for healthcare data interoperability.
Their platform uses Kafka for data streaming and real-time analytics.

icp.icp_reason: Offers advanced EDI solutions with a focus on claims and eligibility transactions.
